description: Non-material amendment to planning permission (ref: 2020/00300/FUL) dated 22 November 2023: for demolition of existing buildings and structures and redevelopment of the site in the form an 18-storey building (plus part lower-ground floor) with two connected 7-storey elements, providing a mix of residential apartments, office space and co-living accommodation, together with associated co-living amenity space and facilities, workspace and a ground floor cafe/ restaurant; new public realm, pedestrian access landscaping and associated works. Amendments to Condition 2 (drawings) to allow for amendments to the design, including to elevations, balustrades, plant, and pv panels. The amendments incorporate the removal of the green roofs at roof level.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
site_name: 227 Wood Lane And Browning House, Wood Lane LondonW12 0DG
